Begins a [ICON_GOLDEN_AGE] Golden Age. May only be built in a [ICON_TOPCITY] World's Greatest City. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]+2 [ICON_GOLD] Gold for each time its city becomes the World's Greatest City. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]The cost goes up the more cities there are in the empire.

The Triumphal Arch is a National Wonder that can only be built in a current or former World's Greatest City. Like all National Wonders, only one may be built and the construction cost increases with the number of Cities in the Empire.

A triumphal arch is a monumental structure in the shape of an archway with one or more arched passageways, often designed to span a road. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]In its simplest form a triumphal arch consists of two massive piers connected by an arch, crowned with a flat entablature or attic on which a statue might be mounted or which bears commemorative inscriptions. The main structure is often decorated with carvings, sculpted reliefs and dedications. More elaborate triumphal arches may have multiple archways. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE]Triumphal arches are one of the most influential and distinctive types of architecture associated with ancient Rome. Thought to have been invented by the Romans, the triumphal arch was used to commemorate victorious generals or significant public events such as the founding of new colonies, the construction of a road or bridge, the death of a member of the imperial family or the accession of a new emperor.

[ICON_BULLET]The Greatest City List [NEWLINE]Available via the Diplo corner pulldown menu, these screens allow you see the current top-rated cities in the world. Here can also view the Hall of Fame, which lists the past and current winners of the Greatest City competition. [NEWLINE] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]How Cities are Ranked [NEWLINE]Cities are ranked by their score in various categories including population, production, gold, sicence, culture, faith (GnK) and tourism (BNW). Cities also get points for having Wonders and being a Holy City. A maximum of 10 points can be earned in each category. [NEWLINE] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Choosing the World's Greatest City ([ICON_TOPCITY]) [NEWLINE]Whenever an era is entered for the first time by any civilization, the city with the current highest score is declared the "World's Greatest City". If more than one city has the highest score, one of them is randomly chosen as the winner. [NEWLINE] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]Rewards for having the World's Greatest City [NEWLINE]The City may build a Triumphal Arch, a National Wonder, that begins a Golden Age.
